note:
I write books, stories, and poems for all ages and am an award winning picture book author. My degrees are in biology and medicine. I post about writing, books, legos, puzzles, art, science, history, video games...basically anything that fascinates me!

alt: profile photo is my author head shot (credit: Carter Hasegawa). I have black hair and brown skin and am smiling. My banner photo is a closeup photo I took of a historical orrery in the Harvard Collection of Scientific Instruments.
